verses.text: 派提摩太前往我們既然不能再忍下去，就決定留在雅典，
派我們的弟兄，就是在基督的福音上和　神同工的提摩太去，為了要在你們的信仰上堅定你們，勸慰你們，

words.note: Commonly refers to fellow believers in the Bible.
Lit. 'blessed news'.
Used to denote scope or aspect.
Capitalized when referring to the Christian God.
Often used in religious contexts for collaboration in ministry.

words.definition: in order to, for the sake of

verses.text: 免得有人在各樣的患難中動搖了。你們自己知道，我們受患難原是命定的。

words.note: Used as a suffix indicating 'among' or 'in the midst of'.

verses.text: 我們在你們那裡的時候，早已對你們說過，我們將會遭受患難。後來應驗了，這是你們知道的。

words.definition: particle (used with noun phrase for time)

words.note: Often used for prophecy fulfillment in religious texts.

verses.text: 因此，我既然不能再忍下去，就派人去打聽你們的信心怎樣；恐怕那試探人的誘惑了你們，以致我們的勞苦白費了。

words.note: Refers to the one who tempts, often Satan in a biblical context.

words.definition: so that, with the result that

verses.text: 提摩太剛剛從你們那裡回來，把你們信心和愛心的好消息帶給我們。他還說，你們常常懷念我們，切切想見我們，好像我們想見你們一樣。

words.note: Lit. 'trusting heart'
Lit. 'loving heart'
Often reduplicated for emphasis.

verses.text: 所以弟兄們，我們在這一切困苦患難中，因著你們的信心就得了安慰。

words.note: Used for fellow Christians.
Used as a suffix indicating 'in the midst of'.
Lit. 'trusting heart'

verses.text: 如果你們在主裡站立得穩，我們就可以活下去了。

words.note: Often follows a place or abstract noun to indicate 'within'.
A V-de-Adj construction indicating ability or degree.

verses.text: 我們因你們的緣故，在我們的　神面前滿有喜樂；為這一切喜樂，我們可以為你們向　神獻上怎麼樣的感謝呢！

words.note: Capitalized 'S' for God. Often reverently preceded by a space in Chinese Christian texts.
Capitalized 'S' for God. Often reverently preceded by a space in Chinese Christian texts.

verses.text: 我們晝夜迫切祈求，要見你們的面，並且要補滿你們信心的不足。

words.note: Lit. 'trusting heart'

verses.text: 願我們的父　神自己和我們的主耶穌為我們開路，使我們可以到你們那裡去。

words.note: A common title for God in Christian contexts.
Common compound title for Jesus in the Bible.

verses.text: 又願主叫你們彼此相愛的心，和愛眾人的心，都充充足足，多而又多，好像我們愛你們一樣。

words.note: Refers to Jesus or God, a title of respect.
Lit. 'many people'.
A reduplicated idiom, emphasizing abundance. Found often in scripture.
Literally 'much and again much'.

verses.text: 也願他堅定你們的心，好叫你們在我們主耶穌和眾聖徒再來的時候，在我們的父　神面前，完全聖潔，無可指摘。

words.note: Common compound title for Jesus in the Bible.
Collective term for believers; lit. 'multitude of holy disciples'.
Used to refer to the second coming of Christ.
A common title for God in Christian contexts.
An idiom meaning 'nothing to criticize'.
